title: 612 Vermont Battery Operated LED Window Candelabra with Sensor and 8 Hour Timer (Pewter)
features: Patented warm white, dual LED flame provides a realistic flickering flame or steady on light
Turns on via a sensor at dusk (darkness). Timer is activated.Turns off after 8 hours, or when it senses darkness.
Requires 3 D batteries (not included). Lasts approximately 70 days on one set of batteries.
Batteries install in the base of the unit providing stability from tipping
Measures: 9” wide x 12.75” high x 2” deep
description: At 612 Vermont we have partnered up with leaders in the window candles market to bring you many high-quality options to choose from. Many of our candles, including this one feature a patented flame that distinguishes them from the run of the mill window candelabra. Our patented flame produces a soft, warm white glow that will be the talk of your street this holiday season. Simply slide the switch up or down to toggle between steady on and flicker flame. The sensor turns the candelabra on at dusk, or when it senses darkness. Timer function is now activated. Timer will turn candolier off 8 hours later, or sensor will turn candolier off if light is sensed before 8 hours. Candelabra operates on 3 D batteries (not included). 70-day battery life. Batteries are installed in the base of the unit, providing stability from tipping off your windowsill.

title: Enjoy a Lovely Warm Flicker -  Lights For So Many Uses
